education.name: Techno India University
education.title: Master of Computer Applications (MCA) — Web & Software Development
description: Pursuing Master of Computer Applications with a specialization in Web & Software Development (ongoing).
Focus on modern full‑stack development using TypeScript, React/Next.js, Node.js and Tailwind CSS.
Hands-on with databases (Postgres, MongoDB), REST/GraphQL APIs, authentication, and cloud deployments.
Coursework and projects emphasize scalable web architecture, web security, DevOps (CI/CD), and collaborative Git workflows.

education.name: Murshidabad College of Engineering & Technology
education.title: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) — Web & Software Development
description: Completed BCA with a focus on web development and software engineering fundamentals
Hands-on with MERN basics, responsive UI with Tailwind, and project-level version control
